name: PolyCars
description:
Polycars is a fun simplistic driving, and racing game,

current features:

car swap, driving, boost, plows, tree physics, rigid body physics

coming soon:

more gamemodes (multiplayer, races, story, etc.)

more cars!

graphics overhaul

more maps

this game is still in development, and any gameplay you see in screenshots, or videos are subject to change
